physicalDescription.note: Stamped on back of photograph: ''Fraser's Photography; 2261 Oswego St.; Aurora, Colo.; EM. 6-2314.''

mods.abstract: Four unidentified men wear tuxedos and wigs with bows and stand in front of a piano and behind two microphones at an event for the Denver Section of the Council of Jewish Women.

name.namePart: National Council of Jewish Women.--Denver Section
